name: MsiExec Web Install
description: Detects suspicious msiexec process starts with web addresses as parameter
false_positives: False positives depend on scripts and administrative tools used in the monitored environment
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(process.command_line:*\ msiexec* AND process.command_line:*\:\/\/*)`
